subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: PHOENIX (AP) — A hobbled Dirk Nowitzki brought the offense. Jason Kidd triggered the defense. The result was a fourth-quarter rally that might have saved the season for the Dallas Mavericks.
snippet: PHOENIX (AP) — A hobbled Dirk Nowitzki brought the offense. Jason Kidd triggered the defense. The result was a fourth-quarter rally that might have saved the season for the Dallas Mavericks.
